findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: The contract is using variables that initialize them only in the constructor and are not defined as `immutable`. Declaring a variable as immutable allows the Solidity compiler to make certain optimizations, reducing storage and computation required by the contract and making it more gas-efficient.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The version lock is a mechanism that allows the author to specify a minimum version of the Solidity compiler that must be used to compile the contract code.
